fullText: Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick bring their real-life chemistry to Neil Simon's trio of one-acts, making for an entertaining evening of familiar pleasures.
dtliExcerpt: Sarah Jessica Parker and Matthew Broderick bring their real-life chemistry to Neil Simon's trio of one-acts, making for an entertaining evening of familiar pleasures.
